mapper.select:
select count(*) from us_product where name = #{name} and code = #{code} and version = #{version}
and id <> #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into us_product (id, name, code, version, release_url, release_time, product_manager, note, status, creator, create_time) values(#{id}, #{name}, #{code}, #{version}, #{releaseUrl}, #{releaseTime}, #{productManager}, #{note}, 1, #{creator}, now())
mapper.update: update us_product set status=#{status}, editor=#{editor}, edit_time=now() where id in #{id}
mapper.select: select id, name, english_name englishName, icon, release_url releaseUrl from us_product where status=1 order by CONVERT(name USING gbk), release_time desc
